snippet: Star British fund manager Neil Woodford, who left Invesco Perpetual in April to start his own firm, is beginning his new role with a focus on tobacco and drug stocks, believing they can withstand what he expects will be a faltering global economy....

headline.print_headline: Ex-Invesco Star Woodford's Start-Up Bets on Tobacco, Drug Firms
headline.main: Ex-Invesco Star Woodford's Start-Up Bets on Tobacco, Drug Firms

lead_paragraph: Star British fund manager Neil Woodford, who left Invesco Perpetual in April to start his own firm, is beginning his new role with a focus on tobacco and drug stocks, believing they can withstand what he expects will be a faltering global economy.
